subject: M1: VERIFY - Build system works
description:
Verify Milestone 1 is complete: Zig project compiles and DuckDB works.

**Verification commands:**
```bash
cd zig
zig build           # Should compile
./zig-out/bin/ccq   # Should run and print DuckDB success
```

**Checklist:**
- [ ] `zig build` exits with code 0
- [ ] Binary exists at `zig/zig-out/bin/ccq`
- [ ] Running binary shows DuckDB connection success
- [ ] No memory leaks reported

**If failures:**
- Check zuckdb hash is correct in build.zig.zon
- Verify libc is linked in build.zig
- Check I/O buffer setup matches Zig 0.15.2 pattern

**Gate:** Do not proceed to M2 until this passes.
